“一切”都会阻止开发者删除自己的 npm 包https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/everything-blocks-devs-from-removing-their-own-npm-packages/ Thu, 04 Jan 2024 04:55:00 -0500阿克斯·夏尔马Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/everything-blocks-devs-from-removing-their-own-npm-packages/ Over the holidays, the npm package registry was flooded with more than 3,000 packages, including one called "everything," and others named a variation of the word. These 3,000+ packages make it impossible for all npm authors to unpublish their packages from the registry. [...]
